name: Pool.Leadership
display_help: Good leaders are rare. These powers can grant bonuses to your and your teammates.

powers.name: Pool.Leadership.Defense
powers.display_help: A good leader knows how to protect his team. While active, this power increases the Defense of yourself and all nearby teammates to all attacks. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack
display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 60 ft. radius (255 targets max)

powers.name: Pool.Leadership.Tactics
powers.display_help: While this power is active, your chance to hit and that of all your nearby teammates is increased. Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse and Fear effects, as well as your Perception so you can detect Stealthy foes. Purchasing Tactics requires the user to be level 14 and possess Maneuvers or Assault. Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team +To Hit, Res(Confuse, Fear), +Perception

powers.name: Pool.Leadership.Vengeance
powers.display_help: The loss of a comrade enrages the team. When a teammate is defeated in combat, activate this power to grant you and your teammates a bonus to chance to hit, Damage and Defense to all attacks. A Vengeful team has no fear, and Vengeance protects you and your Teammates from Fear effects. It also gives you and your team great resistance to Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Immobilize, Confuse, Taunt, Placate and Knockback. You must be at least level 14 and have two other Leadership Powers before selecting Vengeance. This power does not stack with multiple castings. Recharge: Very Long

display_info.Effect Area: AoE â€” 100 ft. radius (255 targets max)
display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

powers.name: Pool.Leadership.Victory_Rush
powers.display_help: The defeat of an opponent gives your team a rush of adrenaline. The excitement of your victory increases the recovery and reduces the endurance cost of your powers. This effect extends to your teammates as well. The total strength of this bonus is dependent upon the rank of the enemy on which this is cast, with Archvillains and Giant Monsters providing the greatest benefit. This power does not stack with multiple castings. You must be level 14 and have trained at least two other Leadership powers before you can train Victory Rush. This power's Recharge Time cannot be reduced. Note that Victory Rush is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Very Long

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack
